channel.title: HELP WITH ADMINSHIP ON TESTSCAPE!Please,
channel.description:
Ok i got a problem on my server i cant become an admin on it.I go to charecters and i change the 0 to 2 or 3 and im not loged in... and so i change it to 3 save click runserver then open moparscape and log in succesfully and i cant see my crown or anything like that. I cant even spawn items. And when i log out and check charecters the 3 or 2 went back to 0.
CAN ANYONE HELP ME WITH THE CODING BECOMING AN ADMIN???

item.title: HELP WITH ADMINSHIP ON TESTSCAPE!Please,
item.dc:creator: @ikick221 ikick221
item.description:
@ikick221 wrote:

ok, sear for this…

[quote=“illbum, post:2, topic:60153”]search for

start of mod

or

mod/admin

right before

if(playerId == -1) out.write(7);

copy and paste this (change YOURNAMEHERE to whatever you want your name to be

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE")) { playerRights = 3; }[/quote] In client.java

Read full topic

item.title: HELP WITH ADMINSHIP ON TESTSCAPE!Please,
item.dc:creator: @illbum illbum
item.description:
@illbum wrote:

search for

start of mod

or

mod/admin

right before

copy and paste this (change YOURNAMEHERE to whatever you want your name to be

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOURNAMEHERE")) { playerRights = 3; }
